channel.title: The Revoloutionist - Neutral Special
channel.description:
> [Color=white] ***The Revolutionist - Neutral Special*** [/color] > > *(Passives)* > > ***Determined*** - Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive. > > ***Secret meeting*** - Player who got [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] can talk to each other as (anonymous[Random number])at night,[Color=white] ***Revolutionist*** [/color] will show as leader in chatbox.(Keep this perk after class change)(After [Color=white] ***Revolutionist*** [/color] died,the group will get disbanded.) > > *(Day ability)* > > ***Blackmailing(2 charges)*** - Make one player can't vote,talk or use any ability.(Can also target king)(Can't use when trial) > > *(Night ability)* > > ***Recruit(Unlimited charges)*** - Target two player,they will get [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color].([Color=Yellow]Royal Blood[/color] player or [Color=white]Neutral[/color] player immune) > > [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] player KNOWS they are recruited >[Color=white] ***Revolutionist*** [/color] also knows who is [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] > > ***Riot(3 Charges,Unusable until d3)*** - Make one of the [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] player(or self) attack another player OR king. > > ***Goal***:End the game with only [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] player,[Color=Purple] Unseen [/color]/[Color=Red] Cult[/color] and [Color=White]Neutral[/color].
> After become ***king***.(which is very hard) > > > [Color=white] ***The NEW BD king - Neutral Special*** [/color] > > > ***(Passives)*** > > ***Tenacity*** - Can talk at all points in a trial. > > ***Determined*** - Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive.(Can regain this passive after become king) > > *(Day ability)* > > ***The royal finger(Unlimited uses)*** - The next nomination for treason will count twice. > > ***Decide fate(2 uses)*** - Decide an accused player's fate. > > (Night ability) > > ***Invitation(2 uses)*** - Force one player to become [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color](Bypass royal blood immune). > > ***Demanding(3 uses)*** - Force one player who got [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] to attack another player. > > ***Goal***:End the game with only [Color=Orange]***Recruited***[/color] player,[Color=Purple] Unseen [/color]/[Color=Red] Cult[/color] and [Color=White]Neutral[/color].
Edit 1.1:Changed ***Revolutionist's*** goal

item.title: The Revoloutionist - Neutral Special

item.description:
Lastday3312:

Riot(3 Charges,Unusable until d3) - Make one of the Recruited player(or self) attack each other OR king.

So the Recruited can only attack Recruited?

Lastday3312:

Recruit(Unlimited charges) - Target two player,they will get Recruited .(Royal Blood player or Neutral player immune)

2 players a night?

Read full topic

item.title: The Revoloutionist - Neutral Special
item.dc:creator: Lastday3312
item.description:
The Revolutionist - Neutral Special

(Passives)

Determined - Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive.

Secret meeting - Player who got Recruited can talk to each other as (anonymous[Random number])at night, Revolutionist will show as leader in chatbox.(Keep this perk after class change)(After Revolutionist died,the group will get disbanded.)

(Day ability)

Blackmailing(2 charges) - Make one player can’t vote,talk or use any ability.(Can also target king)(Can’t use when trial)

(Night ability)

Recruit(Unlimited charges) - Target two player,they will get Recruited.(Royal Blood player or Neutral player immune)

Recruited player KNOWS they are recruited
Revolutionist also knows who is Recruited

Riot(3 Charges,Unusable until d3) - Make one of the Recruited player(or self) attack another player OR king.

Goal:End the game with only Recruited player, Unseen / Cult and Neutral.

After become king.(which is very hard)

The NEW BD king - Neutral Special

(Passives)

Tenacity - Can talk at all points in a trial.

Determined - Become death immune for 1 night if attacked, then lose this passive.(Can regain this passive after become king)

(Day ability)

The royal finger(Unlimited uses) - The next nomination for treason will count twice.

Decide fate(2 uses) - Decide an accused player’s fate.

(Night ability)

Invitation(2 uses) - Force one player to become Recruited(Bypass royal blood immune).

Demanding(3 uses) - Force one player who got Recruited to attack another player.

Goal:End the game with only Recruited player, Unseen / Cult and Neutral.

Edit 1.1:Changed Revolutionist’s goal

Read full topic
